statements: DELETE FROM lesson_plans WHERE lesson_name = 'Math Lesson' AND objective = 'Learn addition and subtraction';
DELETE FROM curriculum WHERE age_range = '3-5 years' AND curriculum_name = 'Preschool Curriculum';
DELETE FROM lesson_plans WHERE curriculum_id = (SELECT curriculum_id FROM early_childhood_education_curriculum WHERE curriculum_name = 'Mathematics');
DELETE FROM lesson_plan WHERE lesson_name = 'Math Lesson';
DELETE FROM assessment WHERE assessment_type='Midterm Exam' AND assessment_date < '2022-06-01';
DELETE FROM lesson_plan WHERE lesson_name='Introduction to Math' AND lesson_duration > 60;
